title: Half-Season Superlatives and Kings Nation | Group Chat (Ep. 366)
description:
We award 2018-19 half-season awards for: Best Player, Most Surprising Team, Most Disappointing Team, Most Confusing Team, and League Pass Poison Teams (0:50). Then, Kings superfan Riley McAtee joins to talk about how he hopes the rest of Sacramento’s season unfolds (43:46).

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Haley O’Shaughnessy, Paolo Uggetti
Guest: Riley McAtee

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
